summary: The client notified Mike of a sprint reset due to technical issues and inquired about readiness. Mike acknowledged the reset, confirmed a clean slate, and requested sprint priorities to propose 2-5 user stories focused on MVP features like employee management or authentication.

actions.task: Provide sprint priorities to enable proposal of 2-5 user stories

backlog_deltas.title: Treat previous sprint entries (US-001, US-010, US-015) as clean slate after reset, updating statuses as needed

risks.mitigation: Monitor and address technical hiccups promptly to avoid disruptions
